TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationAccessControlAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationAccessControlAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ApplicationAccessControlAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 为包含 类的程序集指定访问控制。

span.span: Specifies access controls to an assembly containing classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 .NET Framework 版本1.1 中，如果此属性不存在于程序集中，则默认情况下将启用 COM + 安全配置。In .NET Framework version 1.1, if this attribute is not present in the assembly, the COM+ security configuration is enabled by default. 这是 .NET Framework 版本1.0 中的行为更改。This is a change in behavior from .NET Framework version 1.0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此特性来控制对包含类的程序集的访问 。The following code example demonstrates the use of this attribute to control access to an assembly containing classes. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Security#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Security/CPP/employeeinformation.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Security#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Security/CS/employeeinformation.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Security#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Security/VB/employeeinformation.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，启用 COM+ 安全配置。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, enabling the COM+ security configuration.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此特性来控制对包含类的程序集的访问 。The following code example demonstrates the use of this attribute to control access to an assembly containing classes. summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例并设置 属性以指示是否启用 COM 安全配置。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and sets the property indicating whether to enable COM security configuration.

summary.span: 获取访问检查级别或将访问检查级别设置为进程级别或组件级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the access checking level to process level or to component level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅 Windows 2000 和更高版本支持此属性。This property is supported only on Windows 2000 and later. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property.
